name: RadioGroup.Root

disabled.description: Whether or not the radio group is disabled. This prevents the user from interacting with it.
disabled.description_zh: Whether or not the radio group is disabled. This prevents the user from interacting with it.

required.description: Whether or not the radio group is required.
required.description_zh: Whether or not the radio group is required.

loop.description: Whether or not the radio group should loop through the items when navigating with the arrow keys.
loop.description_zh: Whether or not the radio group should loop through the items when navigating with the arrow keys.

orientation.description: The orientation of the radio group.
orientation.description_zh: The orientation of the radio group.

value.description: The value of the currently selected radio item. You can bind to this value to control the radio group's value from outside the component.
value.description_zh: The value of the currently selected radio item. You can bind to this value to control the radio group's value from outside the component.

onValueChange.description: A callback that is fired when the radio group's value changes.
onValueChange.description_zh: A callback that is fired when the radio group's value changes.

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.

description: The radio group component used to group radio items under a common name for form submission.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
